description: This file defines React context and hooks for managing application state in a React frontend, including state initialization, reducer logic, context provider, and hooks for accessing state and actions. It handles themes, tasks, runners, real-time updates, and UI notifications.

methods.name: uid
methods.description: Generates a unique identifier string based on current timestamp and a random component.

methods.name: reducer
methods.description: Handles state updates based on dispatched actions, managing theme, data, selection, realtime status, and UI toasts/confirmations.
